```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)
library(stats)
library(reshape2)
library(vtable)
library(kableExtra)
library(lubridate)
library(randomcoloR)
library(patchwork)
```

```{r load data, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
covid_weekly = read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/puzeng/BIOSTAT707_Course_Project/main/covid_weekly.csv')
covid_weekly = covid_weekly[, -1]
```


```{r Summary Stats Tbl}
sumtable(covid_weekly,
         summ = c('notNA(x)', 'mean(x)', 'sd(x)', 'propNA(x)', 'pctile(x)[75]', 'max(x)'),
         summ.names = c('Count', 'Mean', "SD", 'Prop of NAs', 'Pctle 75', 'Max'),
         align = 'center',
         col.align = 'center',
         col.breaks = 6)
```


```{r}
set.seed(2021)
color_scheme = randomColor(count = length(unique(covid_weekly$id)),
                           hue = 'random', luminosity = 'dark')

covid_weekly$Color_by_id = color_scheme
```
